name: Teabug
description:
Teabug

You are a bug inside a teapot, you wake up, and it is 4 o'clock. Oh no! It  is tea time and everybody wants tea! You have to save yourself from the tea drinkers by keeping yourself inside the air bags that will appear inside the teapot.

This game was took around 3 hours and 30 minutes to develop.

Controls

W / Up-arrow: Move Forward

Mouse: The player faces the mouse's direction!

Author of music: Pix
